ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Hate Lists
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve only been in Burning Woods once.  I was in a group that consisted of a ranger, cleric, and two other bards.  I was the lowest level (37th) of anyone in
ygData.messageBody:
I've only been in Burning Woods once. I was in a group that consisted of a
ranger, cleric, and two other bards. I was the lowest level (37th) of
anyone in the group. On everything we fought, the ranger snared and the
highest level bard kept fear song up the entire fight. We fought gorillas,
hornets, and wurms. The only person in the group who took consistent damage
was the ranger. The three bards hardly ever got touched. Was your group
using snare/fear or were you fighting with conventional tactics? BTW we
were able to kill Gullerback (named gorilla with a helluva lot of HPs) using
this technique. Took us forever and the cleric had to heal the ranger
several times but we were never in serious trouble.

Galtin

-----Original Message-----
From: Bill Tong [mailto:biltong88@...]
Sent: Friday, June 09, 2000 6:19 AM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: [eqbards] Hate Lists

My Bard is a bit low level and as such has never been
to Burning Woods - but both my wizard and Ranger visit
there quite often.

When any of us group with our bards ( 40plus ) in
burning woods we have an EXTREMELY hard time keeping
the mobs off him/her. Its like a flag pops up that
says Bard in the zone - get him/her.
